评论详情: I wanted to like this dress so much, but the fit was so weird on it. It was tight in the shoulders and arms, yet loose in the torso. When I tied up the neck, it felt like the dress was going to choke me. Also, the length was not good, but that may have been a personal qualm. All in all, it gets a 2 because there was so much going on with it.

I was sort of excited about getting some RTR deals on Amazon, but I was incredibly disappointed. For the prices charged, they should be ashamed. The white part of the dress was so incredibly dingy and not white at all. Terrible buy. Wouldn’t recommend.
